title: Classic 1965 Ford Mustang
description: A beautifully preserved 1965 Mustang, the icon of American muscle cars. Perfect for collectors and vintage car lovers.

title: Michael Schumacher F1 Race Suit Display
description: A legendary piece of motorsport memorabilia – authentic race suit signed by Michael Schumacher, ideal for F1 fans.

title: First Edition Porsche 911 Manual
description: Own the original owner's manual from the launch of the Porsche 911 – a rare piece of automotive literature history.

title: Vintage Louis Vuitton Car Trunk
description: Luxury and auto heritage combine in this custom Louis Vuitton trunk designed for classic touring cars.

title: Banksy Car Hood Art Installation
description: Original Banksy graffiti painted on a salvaged car hood – a fusion of urban art and auto culture.

title: Ferrari Enzo Die-Cast Collector's Model
description: This 1:18 scale Ferrari Enzo die-cast model is a highly detailed piece for car collectors and Ferrari enthusiasts.

title: Antique Japanese Car Sword Shift Lever
description: A handcrafted katana-inspired gear shift from a 1970s Japanese sports car – rare and stylish collector’s item.
